Medium: 6 etchings (1 with soft ground etching and lift ground aquatint) and 2 soft ground etchings (1 with lift ground aquatint), printed in black on cream, smooth, laid Van Gelder paper; and 1 transfer lithograph, printed in black on ivory, smooth, wove Arches paper; and 100 line block reproductions after pen and ink drawings
Dimensions:
irreg. page  14 15/16 x 11" (38 x 28 cm)
Prints:  various dimensions.
Title: LE PÈRE UBU À LA GUERRE
